articles.author: Sherry Liang, CNN
articles.title: November's full moon will be the longest partial lunar eclipse in over 500 years - CNN
articles.description: November's full moon will be the longest partial lunar eclipse in over five centuries. It will grace North American skies late Thursday into early Friday.
